ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Digest Number 290
ygData.msgSnippet: ... First go to www.eqnecro.com and print out all your spells, get to know them.  There are a few ones at the lower levels you will still use from time to
ygData.messageBody:
>

First go to www.eqnecro.com and print out all your spells, get to know them. There are a few ones at the lower levels you will still use from time to time, line the invis lines, locate corpse, and some dots from the mid high 30's like scourge at times as well. I'd make a chart of the damage spells how much they do over what time, mana
cost. Also get a list of the pet commands. Read up on necro strategies on that site and experiment yourself a little on some safe things. There are probably more or better things you could do as well, but that is some advice of the top of my head.

-Jahet





>
>
> Hiya all, my friend just quit the game and gave me his account. It has a 51 nec, that I don't know how to play hehe. He said he might consider coming back sometime in the future, so I want to try and get his necro to 60 by then =) I'm totally new to a necro, but I do have a 49 druid. Any tips on the necro would be greatly appreciated. Thanks!
